events.event-delete-confirmation: Is jy seker jy wil hierdie gebeurtenis verwyder?
events.new-notification-form-description: Mealie maak van Apprise gebruik om kennisgewings te genereer. Hulle bied baie verskeie dienste as dit kom by kennisgewings. Verwys na hulle wiki vir 'n meer omvattende gids oor hoe om 'n URL vir jou gebruik te genereer. Indien beskikbaar, wanneer die tipe kennisgewing gespesifeer word, ontsluit dit ekstra funksies.
events.what-events: Op watter gebeurtenisse moet hierdie kennisgewing inteken?
events.when-a-user-in-your-group-creates-a-new-: Wanneer 'n gebruiker in jou groep 'n nuwe eetplan skep
events.when-a-new-user-joins-your-group: Wanneer 'n nuwe gebruiker by jou groep aansluit

general.confirm-delete-generic: Is jy seker jy wil dit uitvee?
general.file-folder-not-found: Lêer of vouer nie gevind nie
general.name: Naam
general.subject: Onderwerp
general.confirm-delete-generic-with-name: Is jy seker jy wil {name} uitvee?
general.confirm-delete-own-admin-account: Neem asseblief kennis dat jy probeer om jou eie administrateur rekening uit te vee! Hierdie aksie kan nie ontdoen word nie en sal jou rekening permanent uitvee.
general.clipboard-not-supported: Sny en plak is nie moontlik nie
general.your-browser-does-not-support-clipboard: Jou webblaaier ondersteun nie die knipbord nie
general.copied-items-to-clipboard: Geen item na knipbord gekopieer|Een item na knipbord gekopieer|{count} items na knipbord gekopieer

group.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-the-grou: Is jy seker jy wil <b>{groupName}<b/> uitvee?
group.cannot-delete-default-group: Kan nie standaard groep uitvee nie
group.cannot-delete-group-with-users: Kan nie groep met gebruikers uitvee nie

settings.keep-my-recipes-private-description: Stel jou groep en alle resepte by verstek privaat. Jy kan dit later verander.

group.manage-members-description: Bestuur die regte van die lede in jou groepe. {manage} gee die gebruiker toegang tot die databestuurbladsy {invite} gee die gebruiker die vermoë om uitnodigingskakels vir ander gebruikers te skep. Groepeienaars kan nie hul eie toestemmings verander nie.
group.default-recipe-preferences-description: Dit is die standaardverstellings wanneer jy 'n nuwe resep in jou groep skep. Dit kan vir individuele resepte in die resepinstellingskieslys verander word.
group.private-group-description: Deur jou groep op privaat te stel, stel alle publieke kykopsies op verstek. Dit oorskryf die verstellings per resep.
group.allow-users-outside-of-your-group-to-see: Laat gebruikers buite jou groep toe om jou resepte te sien

Indien hierdie opsie aangeskakel is, kan jy 'n resep met enigiemand deel. Sonder dat hulle 'n rekening het. As hierdie opsie afgeskakel is, kan jy net 'n resep met mense in jou groep deel. Of met 'n voorafgemaakte private skakel
group.show-nutrition-information-description: As dit geaktiveer is, sal jy die voedingsinligting saam met die resep sien. Maar net as jy hierdie inligting bygevoeg het
group.show-recipe-assets-description: Wanneer dit geaktiveer is, sal jy die bylae vir hierdie resep sien indien beskikbaar
group.default-to-landscape-view-description: Wanneer dit geaktiveer is, sal jy die opskrif van hierdie resep in landskapaansig sien
group.disable-users-from-commenting-on-recipes: Deaktiveer gebruikers om kommentaar op resepte te lewer
Indien dit aangeskakel is, sal jy geen kommentaar op resepte sien nie en besoekers kan ook nie kommentaar lewer nie
group.disable-organizing-recipe-ingredients-by: Skakel die organisering van resepbestanddele volgens eenhede en kos af
Wanneer dit aangeskakel is, sal jy die Kos, Eenheid en Hoeveelheid van hierdie resep as gewone teks sien.
group.admin-group-management-text: Veranderinge aan hierdie groep sal onmiddellik weerspieël word.

meal-plan.no-meal-planned-for-today: Geen maaltyd beplan vir vandag nie
meal-plan.only-recipes-with-these-categories-will-: Slegs resepte met hierdie kategorieë sal in maaltydplanne gebruik word
meal-plan.meal-plan-rules-description: Jy kan reëls skep om resepte vir jou maaltydplanne outomaties te kies. Hierdie reëls word deur die bediener gebruik om die willekeurige poel resepte te bepaal om van te kies wanneer maaltydplanne geskep word. Let daarop dat as reëls dieselfde dag/tipe beperkings het, dan sal die kategorieë van die reëls saamgevoeg word. In praktyk is dit onnodig om duplikaatreëls te skep, hoewel dit moontlik is om dit te doen.
meal-plan.new-rule-description: Wanneer 'n nuwe reël vir 'n maaltydplan geskep word, kan jy die reël beperk tot 'n spesifieke dag van die week en/of 'n spesifieke tipe maaltyd. Om 'n reël op alle dae of alle maaltye toe te pas, kan jy die reël op "Enige" stel wat dit op alle moontlike waardes vir die dag en/of maaltydtipe sal toepas.

chowdown.description-long: Mealie ondersteun die chowdown-bewaarplekformaat. Laai die kodebewaarplek af as 'n .zip-lêer en laai dit hieronder op.
chowdown.title: Chowdown

nextcloud.description-long: Nextcloud-resepte kan ingevoer word vanaf 'n zip-lêer wat die data bevat wat in Nextcloud gestoor is. Sien die voorbeeldstruktuur hieronder om te verseker dat jou resepte ingevoer kan word.
nextcloud.title: Nextcloud Cookbook

copymethat.description-long: Mealie kan resepte van Copy Me That invoer. Voer jou resepte in HTML-formaat uit en laai dan die .zip hieronder op.
copymethat.title: Reseptebestuurder Copy Me That

paprika.description-long: Mealie kan resepte vanaf die Paprika-program invoer. Voer jou resepte uit Paprika uit, hernoem die uitvoeruitbreiding na .zip en laai dit hieronder op.
paprika.title: Paprika resepte bestuurder

mealie-pre-v1.description-long: Mealie kan resepte invoer vanaf ou weergawes van Mealie (voor weergawe 1.0). Voer jou resepte uit die ou weergawe uit en laai die zip-lêer hieronder op. Neem asseblief kennis dat slegs resepte van uitvoer ingevoer kan word.
mealie-pre-v1.title: Ou weergawes Mealie (voor weergawe 1.0)

tandoor.description-long: Mealie kan resepte van Tandoor invoer. Voer jou data uit in die "Standaardformaat" en laai dan die .zip-lêer op.
tandoor.title: Tandoor resepte

migration.recipe-data-migrations-explanation: Jy kan resepte vanaf 'n ander program in Mealie invoer. Op hierdie manier kan jy vinnig aan die gang kom.
migration.nextcloud-text: Nextcloud-resepte kan ingevoer word vanaf 'n zip-lêer wat die data bevat wat in Nextcloud gestoor is. Sien die voorbeeldstruktuur hieronder om te verseker dat jou resepte ingevoer kan word.
migration.chowdown-text: Mealie kan invoer vanaf Chowdown. Laai die .zip-lêer daar af. En laai dit hier op
migration.paprika-text: Mealie kan resepte vanaf die Paprika-program invoer. Voer jou resepte uit Paprika uit, hernoem die uitvoeruitbreiding na .zip en laai dit hieronder op.
migration.mealie-text: Mealie kan resepte invoer vanaf ou weergawes van Mealie (voor weergawe 1.0). Voer jou resepte uit die ou weergawe uit en laai die zip-lêer hieronder op. Neem asseblief kennis dat slegs resepte van uitvoer ingevoer kan word.

plantoeat.title: Plan to Eat
plantoeat.description-long: Mealie kan resepte invoer vanaf Plan to Eat.

new-recipe.error-details: Slegs webwerwe met ld+json of mikrodata kan deur Mealie ingevoer word. Die meeste groot resepwebwerwe ondersteun hierdie datastruktuur. As jou werf nie ingevoer kan word nie, maar daar is json-data in die logboek, skep 'n GitHub issue met die URL en data.
new-recipe.error-title: Dit blyk dat ons niks kon vind nie
new-recipe.paste-in-your-recipe-data-each-line-will: Plak jou resepdata in. Elke reël sal as 'n item in 'n lys hanteer word
new-recipe.upload-individual-zip-file: Laai 'n .zip-lêer op wat vanaf 'n ander Mealie-instansie uitgevoer is.
new-recipe.url-form-hint: Kopieer en plak 'n skakel vanaf jou gunstelingresepwebwerf
new-recipe.trim-whitespace-description: Knip voorste en agterste witspasie sowel as leë lyne
new-recipe.trim-prefix-description: Knip die eerste karakter van elke reël af
new-recipe.split-by-numbered-line-description: Pogings om 'n paragraaf te verdeel deur die '1)' of '1.' patrone om te gebruik
new-recipe.make-recipe-image: Maak dit die prentjie vir hierdie resep

recipe.delete-confirmation: Is jy seker jy wil hierdie resep uitvee?
recipe.share-recipe-message: Ek wou my {0}-resep met jou deel.
recipe.title: Titel
recipe.recipe-added-to-list: Resep is by die lys gevoeg
recipe.recipe-added-to-mealplan: Resep is by die maaltydplan gevoeg
recipe.failed-to-add-recipe-to-mealplan: Kon nie resep by maaltydplan voeg nie
recipe.timeline-is-empty: Nog niks op die tydlyn nie. Probeer hierdie resep maak!
recipe.api-extras-description: Resepte ekstras is 'n belangrike kenmerk van die Mealie API. Hulle laat jou toe om pasgemaakte json-sleutel/waarde-pare binne 'n resep te skep om na derdeparty-toepassings te verwys. Jy kan hierdie sleutels gebruik om inligting te bevat om outomatisering of pasgemaakte boodskappe na die gewenste toestel te stuur.
recipe.attach-images-hint: Voeg prente by deur dit in die editor te sleep en te laat val
recipe.enable-ingredient-amounts-to-use-this-fe: Skakel bestanddeelhoeveelhede aan om hierdie funksie te gebruik
recipe.recipes-with-units-or-foods-defined-cann: Resepte met sekere eenhede of kosse kan nie verwerk word nie.
recipe.select-one-of-the-various-ways-to-create: Kies een van die verskillende maniere om 'n resep te skep
recipe.create-a-recipe-by-providing-the-name-al: Skep 'n resep deur dit 'n naam te gee. Alle resepte moet unieke name hê.
recipe.scrape-recipe-description: Voeg 'n resep by via 'n url. Voer die url van die webwerf in wat jy vir 'n resep wil skandeer, Mealie sal probeer om die resep vanaf daardie plek te skandeer en by jou versameling te voeg.
recipe.import-original-keywords-as-tags: Voer oorspronklike sleutelwoorde as merkers in
recipe.import-from-zip-description: Voer 'n enkele resep in wat vanaf 'n ander Mealie-instansie uitgevoer is.
recipe.zip-files-must-have-been-exported-from-m: .zip-lêers moes vanaf Mealie uitgevoer gewees het
recipe.create-a-recipe-by-uploading-a-scan: Skep 'n resep deur 'n skandering op te laai.
recipe.recipe-bulk-importer-description: Die grootmaatresep-invoerder laat jou toe om veelvuldige resepte gelyktydig in te voer deur die webwerwe op die agterkant in tou te plaas en die taak in die agtergrond uit te voer. Dit kan nuttig wees wanneer jy aanvanklik na Mealie migreer, of wanneer jy 'n groot aantal resepte wil invoer.
recipe.recipe-debugger-description: Gryp die URL van die resep wat jy wil debug en plak dit hier. Die URL sal deur die resepskraper geskraap word en die resultate sal vertoon word. As jy nie enige data terugstuur sien nie, word die webwerf wat jy probeer skraap nie deur Mealie of sy skraperbiblioteek ondersteun nie.

backup.error-creating-backup-see-log-file: Kon nie back-up skep nie. Sien loglêer
backup.experimental-description: Back-up skep 'n momentopname van die werf se databasis en data directory. Dit sluit alle data in en kan nie gestel word om substelle data uit te sluit nie. Jy kan dit as 'n momentopname van Mealie neem. Dit dien as 'n agnostiese manier om data uit te voer en in te voer, of om die webwerf na 'n eksterne ligging te back-up.
backup.back-restore-description: Die herstel van hierdie back-up sal alle huidige data in jou databasis en in die data-lêergids oorskryf. {cannot-be-undone} As die herstel suksesvol was, sal jy afgemeld word.
backup.cannot-be-undone: Hierdie aksie kan nie ongedaan gemaak word nie - gebruik met omsigtigheid.
backup.postgresql-note: Gebruik jy PostGreSQL? Lees asseblief eers die {backup-restore-process} voordat jy dit herstel.
backup.irreversible-acknowledgment: Ek verstaan ​​dat hierdie aksie onomkeerbaar en vernietigend is en dataverlies kan veroorsaak

settings.remove-existing-entries-matching-importe: Remove existing entries matching imported entries

theme.error-creating-theme-see-log-file: Error creating theme. See log file.

token.copy-this-token-for-use-with-an-external: Copy this token for use with an external application. This token will not be viewable again.
token.you-have-token-count: You have no active tokens.|You have one active token.|You have {count} active tokens.

toolbox.recipes-affected: No Recipes Affected|One Recipe Affected|{count} Recipes Affected

webhooks.the-urls-listed-below-will-recieve-webho: Die URL's hieronder ontvang webhooks met resepinligting vir die maaltydplan op die geskeduleerde dag. Webhooks sal tans aanloop
webhooks.description: Die webhooks hieronder word uitgevoer wanneer 'n maaltyd vir die dag gedefinieer word. Op die geskeduleerde tyd word die webhooks gestuur met die datums van die resep wat vir die dag geskeduleer is. Let daarop dat die webhook nie presies is nie. Die webhooks word met 5 minute intervalle uitgevoer sodat die webhooks binne 5 +/- minute van die geskeduleerde tyd uitgevoer word.

settings.bug-report-information: Gebruik hierdie inligting om 'n fout aan te meld. Om die besonderhede van jou instansie met ontwikkelaars te deel, is die beste manier om jou probleme vinnig op te los.
settings.docker-volume-help: Mealie requires that the frontend container and the backend share the same docker volume or storage. This ensures that the frontend container can properly access the images and assets stored on disk.
settings.status-unknown-try-running-a-validation: Status Unknown. Try running a validation.
settings.application-version-error-text: Your current version ({0}) does not match the latest release. Considering updating to the latest version ({1}).
settings.secure-site-error-text: Serve via localhost or secure with https. Clipboard and additional browser APIs may not work.
settings.secure-site-success-text: Site is accessed by localhost or https
settings.server-side-base-url-error-text: `BASE_URL` is still the default value on API Server. This will cause issues with notifications links generated on the server for emails, etc.
settings.server-side-base-url-success-text: Server Side URL does not match the default
settings.ldap-ready-error-text: Not all LDAP Values are configured. This can be ignored if you are not using LDAP Authentication.
settings.ldap-ready-success-text: Required LDAP variables are all set.

shopping-list.label: Label
shopping-list.linked-item-warning: This item is linked to one or more recipe. Adjusting the units or foods will yield unexpected results when adding or removing the recipe from this list.
shopping-list.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-ite: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
shopping-list.linked-recipes-count: No Linked Recipes|One Linked Recipe|{count} Linked Recipes
shopping-list.items-checked-count: No items checked|One item checked|{count} items checked

signup.welcome-to-mealie: Welcome to Mealie! To become a user of this instance you are required to have a valid invitation link. If you haven't recieved an invitation you are unable to sign-up. To recieve a link, contact the sites administrator.

user.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-the-link: Are you sure you want to delete the link <b>{link}<b/>?
user.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-the-user: Are you sure you want to delete the user <b>{activeName} ID: {activeId}<b/>?
user.password-has-been-reset-to-the-default-p: Password has been reset to the default password
user.use-8-characters-or-more-for-your-passwo: Use 8 characters or more for your password
user.you-are-not-allowed-to-create-a-user: You are not allowed to create a user
user.you-are-not-allowed-to-delete-this-user: You are not allowed to delete this user
user.enable-advanced-content-description: Enables advanced features like Recipe Scaling, API keys, Webhooks, and Data Management. Don't worry, you can always change this later
user.please-enter-your-email-and-password: Please enter your email and password
user.account-locked-please-try-again-later: Account Locked. Please try again later
user.authentication-method-hint: This specifies how a user will authenticate with Mealie. If you're not sure, choose 'Mealie
user.user-can-invite-other-to-group: User can invite other to group

language-dialog.select-description: Choose the language for the Mealie UI. The setting only applies to you, not other users.
language-dialog.how-to-contribute-description: Is something not translated yet, mistranslated, or your language missing from the list? {read-the-docs-link} on how to contribute!

foods.merge-dialog-text: Combining the selected foods will merge the source food and target food into a single food. The source food will be deleted and all of the references to the source food will be updated to point to the target food.
foods.seed-dialog-text: Seed the database with foods based on your local language. This will create 200+ common foods that can be used to organize your database. Foods are translated via a community effort.
foods.seed-dialog-warning: You have already have some items in your database. This action will not reconcile duplicates, you will have to manage them manually.

units.seed-dialog-text: Seed the database with common units based on your local language.
units.combine-unit-description: Combining the selected units will merge the Source Unit and Target Unit into a single unit. The {source-unit-will-be-deleted} and all of the references to the Source Unit will be updated to point to the Target Unit.

labels.seed-dialog-text: Seed the database with common labels based on your local language.

recipes.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-all-expo: Are you sure you want to delete all export data?
recipes.confirm-delete-recipes: Are you sure you want to delete the following recipes? This action cannot be undone.
recipes.the-following-recipes-selected-length-wi: The following recipes ({0}) will be exported.
recipes.settings-chosen-explanation: Settings chosen here, excluding the locked option, will be applied to all selected recipes.
recipes.recipe-data-description: Use this section to manage the data associated with your recipes. You can perform several bulk actions on your recipes including exporting, deleting, tagging, and assigning categories.
recipes.data-exports-description: This section provides links to available exports that are ready to download. These exports do expire, so be sure to grab them while they're still available.

data-pages.data-management-description: Select which data set you want to make changes to.

user-registration.provide-registration-token-description: Please provide the registration token associated with the group that you'd like to join. You'll need to obtain this from an existing group member.
user-registration.group-details-description: Before you create an account you'll need to create a group. Your group will only contain you, but you'll be able to invite others later. Members in your group can share meal plans, shopping lists, recipes, and more!
user-registration.use-seed-data-description: Mealie ships with a collection of Foods, Units, and Labels that can be used to populate your group with helpful data for organizing your recipes.

banner-experimental.title: Experimental Feature
banner-experimental.description: This page contains experimental or still-baking features. Please excuse the mess.

demo.info_message_with_version: This is a Demo for version: {version}

help.selection-mode-desc: The selection mode is the main mode that can be used to enter data:

selection-mode-steps.draw: Draw a rectangle on the text you want to select.
selection-mode-steps.click: Click on any field on the right and then click back on the rectangle above the image.
selection-mode-steps.result: The selected text will appear inside the previously selected field.

help.pan-and-zoom-desc: Select pan and zoom by clicking the icon. This mode allows to zoom inside the image and move around to make using big images easier.

split-modes.line-mode-desc: In line mode, the text will be propagated by keeping the original line breaks. This mode is useful when using bulk add on a list of ingredients where one ingredient is one line.
split-modes.block-mode-desc: In block mode, the text will be split in blocks. This mode is useful when bulk adding instructions that are usually written in paragraphs.
split-modes.flat-mode-desc: In flat mode, the text will be added to the selected recipe field with no line breaks.

maintenance.action-clean-directories-description: Removes all the recipe folders that are not valid UUIDs
maintenance.action-clean-temporary-files-description: Removes all files and folders in the .temp directory
maintenance.action-clean-images-description: Removes all the images that don't end with .webp
maintenance.actions-description: Maintenance actions are {destructive_in_bold} and should be used with caution. Performing any of these actions is {irreversible_in_bold}.

admin.ingredients-natural-language-processor-e: Mealie uses Conditional Random Fields (CRFs) for parsing and processing ingredients. The model used for ingredients is based off a data set of over 100,000 ingredients from a dataset compiled by the New York Times. Note that as the model is trained in English only, you may have varied results when using the model in other languages. This page is a playground for testing the model.

It's not perfect, but it yields great results in general and is a good starting point for manually parsing ingredients into individual fields. Alternatively, you can also use the "Brute" processor that uses a pattern matching technique to identify ingredients.
admin.background-tasks-description: Here you can view all the running background tasks and their status

profile.description: Manage your profile, recipes, and group settings.
profile.account-summary-description: Here's a summary of your group's information
profile.group-statistics-description: Your Group Statistics provide some insight how you're using Mealie.
profile.storage-capacity-description: Your storage capacity is a calculation of the images and assets you have uploaded.
profile.personal-description: These are settings that are personal to you. Changes here won't affect other users
profile.user-settings-description: Manage your preferences, change your password, and update your email
profile.api-tokens-description: Manage your API Tokens for access from external applications
profile.group-description: These items are shared within your group. Editing one of them will change it for the whole group!
profile.group-settings-description: Manage your common group settings like mealplan and privacy settings.
profile.cookbooks-description: Manage a collection of recipe categories and generate pages for them.
profile.members-description: See who's in your group and manage their permissions.
profile.webhooks-description: Setup webhooks that trigger on days that you have have mealplan scheduled.
profile.notifiers-description: Setup email and push notifications that trigger on specific events.
profile.manage-data-description: Manage your Food and Units (more options coming soon)
profile.data-migrations-description: Migrate your existing data from other applications like Nextcloud Recipes and Chowdown
profile.show-advanced-description: Show advanced features (API Keys, Webhooks, and Data Management)

cookbook.description: Cookbooks are another way to organize recipes by creating cross sections of recipes and tags. Creating a cookbook will add an entry to the side-bar and all the recipes with the tags and categories chosen will be displayed in the cookbook.
cookbook.public-cookbook-description: Public Cookbooks can be shared with non-mealie users and will be displayed on your groups page.
cookbook.filter-options-description: When require all is selected the cookbook will only include recipes that have all of the items selected. This applies to each subset of selectors and not a cross section of the selected items.
